citations.narrative:
Some cleaning and organization are needed on one side of the hedgehog room. The refrigerator must also be cleaned as
spillage and debris are present. In addition, dust, debris and dead insects are present on top of the refrigerator and
storage shelves, and along the window ledge.
Accumulations of clutter, debris and spillage contribute to odor and make it difficult to maintain pest control measures.
The room must be kept clean to facilitate proper husbandry practices for the animals. The facility was most recently cited
under this regulation on 9/27/2022.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.131(c)  Repeat
   
Sanitation. 
Some cleaning and organization are needed on one side of the hedgehog room.  The refrigerator must also be cleaned as 
spillage and debris are present.  In addition, dust, debris and dead insects are present on top of the refrigerator and 
storage shelves, and along the window ledge.  
 
Accumulations of clutter, debris and spillage contribute to odor and make it difficult to maintain pest control measures.  
The room must be kept clean to facilitate proper husbandry practices for the animals.  The facility was most recently cited 
under this regulation on 9/27/2022. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
